abstract: Letter from Mark Nieker, CEO of the Pierson Foundation, comments on Michael Winerip On Education columns of Sept 19 and Oct 10, on free travel provided by the foundation for state education commissioners to attend overseas education conferences.
snippet: The president and C.E.O. of the Pearson Foundation responds to articles about the group sending education commissioners on free trips to win contracts.
lead_paragraph: The president and C.E.O. of the Pearson Foundation responds to articles about the group sending education commissioners on free trips to win contracts.
